title: Crooks & Castles Logo Script Font
content:
Hello Typophiles,. Can anybody help me ID the script font that says Castles?  
Anything similar is also appreciated. Thank you.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322132139im_/http:/typophile.com/files/CrooksAndCastlesLogo_6630.png)
author: TrickStarr92

comments.content: Can't find a match. Even if the 2 /s are different, thought it could have been a font but I have to admit, with such flawless connections, it could be hand-drawn. Alternatives: [Freestyle Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322132139/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/freestyle+script), [Santa Fe](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322132139/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/santa-fe) (possibly the closest even if needed a lot of work), [Kaufmann](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322132139/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/kaufmann)
Awesome. And yes, I was also suspecting it may be hand-drawn. Thank you for the info Ryuk! :)
